metadata.title: Columbia Creek to Peak Short
features: Quick drying. Security pocket. Integrated removable belt. Partial elastic at waist.
description: Being an industry leader in outdoor apparel and products takes passion, and an understanding of people who love the outdoors as much as we do. That's why, from cutting edge technology, to our innovative heritage in Bugaboo, our jackets, pants, fleece, boots, and shoes are all tested tough so you can enjoy the outdoors longer.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1 Pounds", "Department": "mens", "Date First Available": "June 25, 2016", "Manufacturer": "Columbia (Sporting Goods)"}
